name: Legend of the archer
description:
Legend of the archer - the game will tell you the story of a legendary archer who finds himself in the midst of a war between two clans.

The war between the Night Wolves and Hunters clans was in full swing. This went on for years. Until one event changed the entire outcome of the battle. The leader of the hunter clan took possession of a divine weapon that clouded his mind. This weapon changed him greatly, but also gave him enormous strength. Many tried to stop the distraught leader, but only doomed themselves to death. The hunters won this war, and the Night Wolves clan had to retreat.

You have to take on the role of one of the members of the Night Wolves clan and find a way to win this war! Use your bow and arrow to take out your enemies one by one until you've eliminated every single one. Use your weapons wisely and defeat the leader of the hunter clan! Crush all enemies and prove that you are the best!

Peculiarities:
- Play a short campaign in single player mode.
- Explore a new hostile world.
- Go on an exciting journey!
- Interesting levels
